description: Enterprise techniques used by Seth-Locker, ATT&CK software S0639 (v1.0)
name: Seth-Locker (S0639)

techniques.comment: [Seth-Locker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0639) can execute commands via the command line shell.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware February 2021)
[Seth-Locker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0639) can encrypt files on a targeted system, appending them with the suffix .seth.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware February 2021)
[Seth-Locker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0639) has the ability to download and execute files on a compromised host.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware February 2021)
